meanings.definition: A type of bacteria commonly found in the intestines of humans and animals.
meanings.sent1: The enterobacterium helps in the digestion process.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the enterobacterium to understand gut health.
meanings.sent3: The enterobacterium threw a party in the intestines, inviting all its bacterial friends.
meanings.sent4: The enterobacterium is like a tiny worker in the bustling city of the intestines.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the enterobacterium as a tiny, helpful neighbor living in your gut.

meanings.definition: Any bacterium belonging to the genus Enterobacterium.
meanings.sent1: The lab technician identified the enterobacterium under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Enterobacterium species have different characteristics that distinguish them.
meanings.sent3: The enterobacterium from the lab decided to start a band with other bacteria.
meanings.sent4: In the world of bacteria, the enterobacterium is like a celebrity with unique traits.
meanings.sent5: Under the lens, the enterobacterium looks like a tiny, mysterious creature.
